Package BitTorrent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bencoder2
    Parses a Bencoded byte array and returns a combination of Map, List, ByteBuffer, and Integer objects.
    bitFieldDS
    Data Structure to help determine the rarest piece first algorithm.
    ConnectToTracker
    This class connects to tracker and returns a decoded tracker response
    Control
    Controls the flow of the main components
    Event
    This class holds events for GET request
    FileChunks
    This class holds chunk information and can save chunks to file when download has completed
    Helper
    This class holds some helper functions that can be useful in multiple files.
    KeepAliveThread
    Keep Alive thread that sends keep alive messages to peer if we are taking long to response so they don't close their connection
    Message
    This class represents message types sent between two peers through a stream of bytes.
    Peer
    This class creates a peer thread for peers we are connected to for upload an download.
    PeerConnectionsInfo
    This class holds data structure to manage peers
    RUBTClient
    This class starts up the Bit Torrent client and begins download
    TorrentInfo
    This is a data structure class that extracts basic information from a bencoded torrent metainfo file and stores it in public fields.  Note that this class only works for torrent metainfo files for a single-file torrent.
    TrackerIntervalThread
    This class implements Runnable which is a thread to update information to tracker
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BencodingException
